{"id":929546249,"question_id":2725,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1680862213,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/929546249/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Mice and Cheese","memory":"50.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int miceAndCheese(int[] A, int[] B, int k) {\n         int res = 0, n = A.length, diff[] = new int[n];\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            diff[i] = A[i] - B[i];\n            res += B[i];\n        }\n        Arrays.sort(diff);\n        for (int i = 0; i < k; i++)\n            res += diff[n - 1 - i];\n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"mice-and-cheese","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
